verbose_text: The development of obesity and insulin resistance in adult mice was shown to occur concomitantly with increased cardiac size and impaired cardiac insulin signalling due to an increase in Ptpn1-IRbeta, a decrease in IRS1 phosphorylation, and reduced PKB IRS1associated activity [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: insulin resistance in adult mice was shown to occur concomitantly with increased cardiac size and impaired cardiac insulin signalling due to an increase in Ptpn1-IRbeta, a decrease in IRS1 phosphorylation, and reduced PKB
